participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Amina is resilient and outspoken, shaped by her difficult past. She's passionate about expressing herself and often feels frustrated by her circumstances.
participant_1.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was 16. i was forced to marry when i was a child.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and laid-back, with a love for travel and culinary experiences. He enjoys meeting new people and sharing stories about his journeys.
participant_2.background: i've been traveling the world for a few years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go.
